title: Moon Unit's Tea Emporium
description: An all-vegan tea room/bar/event space/artistic hub dubbed as "Amsterdam Cafe meets Gin Palace" is located in The Harley. Offers a wide range of loose-leaf teas, cold brews, cakes and other tea-themed concoctions including tea-secco and a slushie. To be enjoyed tea-total or alcoholic. All totally vegan - don't miss the Saturday vegan high tea. Situated in a super-chilled, carpeted room with lounge and floor seating, a projector screening visuals and plenty of fairy lights. Hosts events in the little hidden Bohemian room also.
